body:
<!-- This form is for bug reports and feature requests ONLY!

If you're looking for help check [Stack Overflow](https://stackoverflow.com/questions/tagged/kubernetes) and the [troubleshooting guide](https://kubernetes.io/docs/tasks/debug-application-cluster/troubleshooting/).

If the matter is security related, please disclose it privately via https://kubernetes.io/security/.
-->

**Is this a BUG REPORT or FEATURE REQUEST?**:

> Uncomment only one, leave it on its own line:
>
/kind bug
> /kind feature


**What happened**:
When I start the apiserver, found apiserver crased due to the priority class already exists.
```
E0814 06:00:23.516116       1 autoregister_controller.go:190] v1.autoscaling failed with : apiservices.apiregistration.k8s.io "v1.autoscaling" already exists
E0814 06:00:23.516317       1 autoregister_controller.go:190] v1beta1.batch failed with : apiservices.apiregistration.k8s.io "v1beta1.batch" already exists
E0814 06:00:23.516443       1 autoregister_controller.go:190] v2alpha1.batch failed with : apiservices.apiregistration.k8s.io "v2alpha1.batch" already exists
F0814 06:00:23.517195       1 hooks.go:188] PostStartHook "scheduling/bootstrap-system-priority-classes" failed: unable to add default system priority classes: priorityclasses.scheduling.k8s.io "system-cluster-critical" already exists
```

**What you expected to happen**:

**How to reproduce it (as minimally and precisely as possible)**:

**Anything else we need to know?**:

**Environment**:
- Kubernetes version (use `kubectl version`): 1.11.1
- Cloud provider or hardware configuration:
- OS (e.g. from /etc/os-release): ubuntu 16.04
- Kernel (e.g. `uname -a`):
- Install tools:
- Others:

labels.description: Categorizes issue or PR as related to a bug.
labels.name: kind/bug

labels.description: Must be staffed and worked on either currently, or very soon, ideally in time for the next release.
labels.name: priority/important-soon

labels.description: Categorizes an issue or PR as relevant to SIG Scheduling.
labels.name: sig/scheduling

title: apiserver crashed when priority classs already exists
